content: पानं [पा-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Drinking, quaffing, kissing (a lip); पयः पानं; देहि मुखकमलमधुपानं <ls>Gīt. 10.</ls> {@--2@} Drinking spirituous liquors; <ls>Ms. 7. 53</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">9. 13</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">12. 45.</ls> {@--3@} A drink, beverage in general; <ls>Ms. 3. 227</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 389.</ls> {@--4@} A drinking vessel. {@--5@} Sharpening, whetting. {@--6@} Protection, defence. {@--7@} A canal. --नः {@--1@} A distiller. {@--2@} Breath, expiration.
